column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered a salad
column3: and the deep dish with the sausage. I really enjoyed the deep dish
column4: although after eating I could tell it was really heavy. The buttery crust was really nice though. It was a good thing we ordered salad because it balanced out the heavy pizza. It was really good
column5: but I think I can only have it when I am really hungry.
